data.Name: Allison Fleming
data.staff_bio: Allison Fleming, M.S., C.R.C., has counseling and case management experience in the public vocational rehabilitation system as well as in educational settings. At ICI, she is a trainer in the New England Job Development Training program and the New England Regional Continuing Education Program. She does in person and online trainings on topics related to employment for people with disabilities. Allison has also worked on projects such as the Peer Employment Benefits Network and Partnerships for Employment.
data.staff_ed:
BS, Springfield College- Rehabilitation Counseling & Disability Services
MS, Springfield College- Rehabilitation Counseling & Alcohol and Substance Abuse Counseling
